section.title: Overview
section.para: This is a module which provides Redis connectivity for Kamailio. It implements the DB API defined in Kamailio.The usage of this module might be restricted to usrloc modules.

section.title: Limitations
section.para: This module has implemented the equivalent operations for INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE and SELECT. db_mode = 3 of usrloc module in kamailio is used . Username based key unique, we do not use ruid etc, thus redis key should be based on username. . Multiple registration is not allowed for same user with different contacts, only one registration per contact. .

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para:
The following libraries or applications must be installed before running &kamailio; with this module loaded:
Redis - "libhiredis>0.13.3". Below key should be included into redis: Hmset kamailio:table_version location "8"

section.title: Usage
section.para: Load the module and set the the DB URL for specific modules to: mongodb://password@host:port/database.
